Taylor Swift European dates kick off in.content: Swifties in Paris are especially excited to hear songs off her new album, "The Tortured Poets Society", being performed for the first time."But it's my birthday and it's Paris and it's the first night of the tour, and I thought why not?The highest-grossing tour in history finally arrived in Europe on Thursday as Taylor Swift kicked off her European dates with four nights in Paris."  - Record-breaker -Some 42,000 people will see Swift in Paris before she heads on for dates in Sweden, Portugal, Spain, Britain, Ireland, Netherlands, Switzerland, Italy, Germany, Poland and Austria.By the end of the year, it had already become the first to sell more than $1 billion in tickets and is on track to more than double that by the time it concludes in Vancouver this December.

Cannes 2024: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and.content:
So far, It is unclear whether Sonam Kapoor, another regular at Cannes, will be walking the red carpet this year.Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Aditi Rao Hydari will return to the Cannes red carpet this year.The two beauties will be walking the red carpet with a bevvy of celebrities, representing a beauty brand that they both are a part of.India at Cannes 2024

Aditi made her red carpet debut in 2022, whereas Aishwarya Rai has been a regular fixture on the Cannes red carpet since 2000.Two Indian films have been selected for screening at Cannes Film Festival 2024.

Trailer of Payal Kapadia's Cannes film A.content: All We Imagine As Light is the first Indian film in competition at Cannes since 1994 and is one of only four female-directed features in the lineup this year.The film is Kapadia's debut feature film and has been selected in the competition section of the upcoming 7th Cannes Film Festival, scheduled to take place later this month.The trailer of All We Imagine As Light, the highly anticipated film by Payal Kapadia, is out.While writing on cinema remains her first love, her other interest lies in

Lady Gaga's concert film, Chromatica Bal.content: The concert film which was originally announced in 2022 will feature footage from Lady Gaga’s global Chromatica Ball stadium tour.”Lady Gaga took to Instagram to share what fans can expect from her concert film as she wrote, “This film chronicles a time of immense creativity… the fashion, the dance, the music.Lady Gaga’s concert film Chromatica Ball finally has a release date.In the trailer of Chromatica Ball, you can hear Lady Gaga shout, “Put your hands up, come on!I hope you will feel seen when you watch this film.

Gisele Bündchen urges fans to donate for.content: The model also said that people near the affected area could help by donating "mattresses and pillows, all types of bedding, toiletries, cleaning products, all types of clothing for all ages, furniture, appliances, pet food, and general daily living items.Gisele Bündchen is trying to make a difference as her home state of Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil has been ravaged by devastating flooding.The model referred to the flooding as "the worst tragedy in its history.Bundchen shared an Instagram Reel containing photos and video of the damage in southern Brazil.The supermodel made an emotional plea to her fans on Wednesday, May 8, asking her followers to consider donating to the Luz Alliance Fund, an initiative she created in partnership with the Brazil Foundation to provide humanitarian pandemic relief to families in Brazil.

Deepika Padukone smacks phone out of fan.content: When she spotted the camera, Deepika did not pay attention to it at first.Currently expecting her first child with Ranveer Singh, Deepika Padukone has been keeping a low profile and hasn’t been spotted as much in public.This is the first time that Deepika Padukone was spotted after divorce rumours started circulating.Mother-to-be Deepika Padukone recently became a meme on social media after she was spotted smacking a phone away from a fan’s hand while they filmed her on the move with her husband Ranveer Singh.However, as she exited the spot, she hit the camera and walked away.

Ali Fazal joins Kamal Haasan in Mani Rat.content: This would be the first full-fledged role for Ali Fazal in the South Indian film industry alongside Kamal Haasan.Mani Ratnam’s next film Thug Life is finally taking shape.The film has roped in Kamal Haasan and Ali Fazal in pivotal roles.The film was a massive blockbuster and was the country’s entry to the 1988 Oscars.”The film falls under the bracket of the gangster genre and is written by Ratnam and Haasan and produced by Raaj Kamal Films International, Madras Talkies and Red Giant Movies.

Miss Teen USA 2023 UmaSofia Srivastava s.content: Srivastava’s resignation came days after Miss USA 2023 Noelia Voigt announced that she was resigning from the title in order to focus on her mental health"I realize this may come as a large shock to many," Voigt, 24, said in an Instagram post announcing the decision, which was shared on Monday, May 6.”“After months of grappling with this decision, I have chosen to resign from the title of Miss Teen USA 2023,” she wrote."Following her announcement, the Miss USA organisation thanked Voigt for her service, saying in a statement that they "respect and support Noelia’s decision to step down from her duties."I will always look back on my time as Miss NJ Teen USA fondly, and the experience of representing my state as a first generation, Mexican-Indian American at the national level was fulfilling in itself.Srivastava's decision comes two days after Miss USA 2023 Noelia Voigt announced her resignation.

Alec Baldwin files motions seeking dismi.content: In another update on the Rust firing case, Alec Baldwin’s lawyers have filed two more motions to throw out his manslaughter indictment.Meanwhile, Rory Kennedy is making a documentary about Alec Baldwin and the Rust shooting.Alec Baldwin maintains that he did not pull the trigger and argues that the government’s actions did not let them show that the gun was not working properly at the time of the shooting.In their latest motions, the actor's lawyers argue that the charge is not legally justified and that he has been deprived of a fair trial because the FBI broke the gun in the case during testing.Her company Moxie Films has been working on a documentary about the case for more than a year.

Demon Slayer: Hashira Training arc: What.content: However, the Demon Slayer: Hashira Training arc contains no big fight scenes, and demons will not appear until the end of the season.The downward trend continues, as the Demon Slayer: Hashira Training Arc will end on June 30.The Demon Slayer: Hashira Training Arc would be the shortest in the series, with only eight episodes.Demon Slayer has always met fans' high expectations because of Ufotable's excellent animation, but Demon Slayer Season 3: Swordsmith's Village arc fell short.So here are some of the things that could go wrong with Demon Slayer: Hashira Training arc.

My Hero Academia Season 7 Episode 2: Exa.content: The first episode of the seventh season introduces viewers to Star and Stripe, the well-known superhero from America.According to official sources, the next My Hero Academia episode will be out on Saturday, May 11, 2024, at 5:30 pm JST.Here's all you need to know about My Hero Academia Episode 2.The first episode of Season 7, "In the Nick of Time!My Hero Academia is back on screen with its seventh season and the premiere was nothing less than amazing.

Alia Bhatt becomes the ‘most visible att.content:
In her second outing at the prestigious fashion gala, Alia grabbed attention with her elegant saree which extended into a 30-foot-trail.Bhatt revealed that her couture saree was crafted by 163 artisans and paid homage to the official dress code for the 2024 Met Gala – The Garden of Time.The most influential of them all

As per a report on the influencer marketing platform Lefty, Alia and Sabyasachi topped the list of brands and most visible star at Met this year and beat the biggest celebrities, influencers and brands when it came to visibility.Bollywood's favourite girl made heads turn on Monday evening as she walked the red carpet at the Met Gala 2024.This was Alia's second appearance at the Met Gala after making a debut last year.

Kangana Ranaut slams Sam Pitroda for his.content:
Kangana's remarks on Pitroda's comments

Kangana took to Instagram Stories to respond to the controversy and wrote: “Congress Uncle Sam said south Indians look like Africans, East/northeast Indians look like Chinese, people from Gujarat belt look like Arabs and people from up north look like white people, I wonder which part of India Uncle Sam belongs to because he looks more like a birdie than human.Where people in the east look like the Chinese, people in the west look like the Arabs, people in the north look like, maybe, white and people in the south look like Africans.Modi asked, “Will the ability of people be decided in my country on the basis of skin colour.People from Gujarat and Maharashtra look perfectly Indians so do up north people, just because your Raja babu is Italian doesn't mean everyone's genes are mixed.Pitroda comment that east Indians resembled the Chinese, while those from the South looked like Africans had raised a storm.

Astroworld Festival case: Nine out of te.content: Nine out of the 10 wrongful death lawsuits filed after the deadly crowd surge at the 2021 Astroworld Festival have been settled, an attorney has revealed including one that was set to go to trial this week.Jury selection had been set to begin Tuesday in the wrongful death lawsuit filed by the family of Madison Dubiski, a 23-year-old Houston resident who was one of 10 people killed during the crowd crush at the concert that featured rap superstar Travis Scott.But Neal Manne, an attorney for Live Nation, the festival’s promoter and one of those being sued, said during a court hearing Wednesday that only one wrongful death lawsuit remained pending with the rest nine all being settled, including the one filed by Dubiski’s family.More than 20 defendants, including Scott, Apple and Live Nation, the festival’s promoter, had been set to go on trial Tuesday.Attorneys in the litigation were set to meet next week to discuss when the lawsuit filed by Blount’s family could be set for trial.

Shekhar Suman is ready to campaign for K.content:
A few years after they broke up, both Adhyayan and Shekhar levelled allegations that Kangana did black magic on her ex-boyfriend.” 

“Shekhar Suman in an interview had said Kangana Ranaut abused and did black magic on his son.This new BJP leader Shekhar Suman had accused senior BJP leader Kangana Ranaut of performing black magic against his son, using menstrual blood.Earlier this week, Suman joined the Bharatiya Janata Party, weeks after his son Adhyayan Suman's ex-girlfriend Ranaut joined the party.Hope Shekhar Suman does not later say that BJP had done black magic on him,” stated a third tweet.

Filmmaker Sangeeth Sivan passes away at.content:
Om Shanti my friend, may your family get the strength to overcome your loss"

 Shocked to hear about the passing away of my dear friend @sangeethsivan , can’t believe that you are no longer amongst us, but you will always be with us in our hearts and memories .com/kvTkFJmEXxVeteran actor Sunny Deol also paid tribute to the late filmmaker and wrote, "Shocked to hear about the passing away of my dear friend @sangeethsivan can’t believe that you are no longer amongst us, but you will always be with us in our hearts and memories."Deeply saddened and shocked to know that Sangeeth Sivan Sir is no more.Ritesh took to X and wrote, “Deeply saddened and shocked to know that Sangeeth Sivan Sir is no more.In his long career, Sivan has helmed films like Vyooham, Daddy, Gandharvam, Yodha and Hindi comedy blockbusters like Kya Kool Hai Hum and Apna Sapna Money Money.

Gisele Bündchen has been 'deeply disappo.content:
The Netflix roast featuring Tom Brady has not gone down well with his children and ex-wife Gisele Bündchen.On Sunday, every aspect of Tom's life was dissected in 'GROAT The Greatest Roast Of All Time: Tom Brady.Bridget Moynahan, with whom Brady shares his son Jack, 16, was also brought up during the roast.Tom Brady had famously split from Bridget Moynahan while she was pregnant, only to start dating Gisele Bündchen soon after.'

During the roast, no subject seemed to be off limits, including his relationship with his ex-wife Gisele and the kids.

Drake and Kendrick Lamar feud: Everythin.content: It escalated when J Cole reignited the beef when he rapped about Drake and Lamar and called them the “big three” and added, that he now feels like “Muhammad Ali”.Rapping about Lamar, Drake said, “You ain’t in no Big Three, SZA got you wiped down, Travis got you wiped down, Savage got you wiped down.This can easily be called the biggest rap feud in recent history as Drake and Kendrick Lamar are all guns blazing against each other – to the point that a security guard was shot outside Drake’s Toronto house.In his own verse, Drake accused Lamar of delaying his response track because of the imminent release of Taylor Swift’s “The Tortured Poets Department.On April 24, Drake responded with a second, A-assisted diss track, “Taylor Made Freestyle” which included verses from Tupac and Snoop Dogg, two of Lamar’s influences.

Marvel will no longer release more than.content: Bob Iger said, “We’re slowly going to decrease volume and go to probably about two TV series a year instead of what had become four and reduce our film output from maybe four a year to two, or a maximum of three.We will no longer get bombarded with more than three films a year from the Marvel camp as Disney CEO Bob Iger confirms that the MCU is cutting down on yearly deliverables.”Bob also added that there was a lot to look forward to this year and next as he said that there are “a couple of good films in ’25 and then we’re heading to more ‘Avengers,’ which we’re extremely excited about,” adding: “Overall, I feel great about the slate.Bob also added that the upcoming slate will have a mix of sequels and originals, noting that the focus is currently more on franchise films: “We’re gonna balance sequels with originals.”Meanwhile, the announcement and Marvel calendar are currently at odds since their recent release calendar distributed by Disney has four films in 2025 — Captain America: Brave New World, Thunderbolts, The Fantastic Four, and Blade.
